channel.title: Help! anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor
channel.description:
Hey guys, Need some help for configuring anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor for port 9193. I tried using instructions from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Template:Systemd-socket-proxyd, but without success. I used this: example: file_port_tuples+=" port#9193:9050 " ## system Tor default SocksPort and after: systemd-unit-files-generator
I see a 2nd option is to create a unix domain socket file, but I don't understand/know how to create it. Can please someone explain how to do it?
Thank you

item.title: Help! anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor

item.description:

-> http://dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/wiki/Dev/anon-ws-disable-stacked-tor
